com.fincons.rabbitmq.publisher
Interface EventFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicEventFactory
public interface EventFactory

This interface defines methods to create Event objects to be published.

Author:
Fincons Group AG

Method Summary
 Event create(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> headers, byte[] payload, boolean isPersistent)
          Creates a new event to be published with the default content type, content encoding, and priority.
 Event create(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> headers, byte[] payload, java.lang.String contentType, java.lang.String contentEncoding, int priority, boolean isPersistent)
          Creates a new event.
 

Method Detail

create

Event create(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> headers,
             byte[] payload,
             boolean isPersistent)
Creates a new event to be published with the default content type, content encoding, and priority.

Parameters:
headers - the event headers
payload - the event payload
isPersistent - true if the event must be stored, false otherwise
Returns:
a new Event object

create

Event create(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> headers,
             byte[] payload,
             java.lang.String contentType,
             java.lang.String contentEncoding,
             int priority,
             boolean isPersistent)
Creates a new event.

Parameters:
headers - the event headers
payload - the event payload
contentType - the media type of the payload
contentEncoding - the encoding of the payload
priority - the event priority
isPersistent - true if the event must be stored, false otherwise
Returns:
a new Event object
